name: Blasting Charges
effect: The Architect targets up to a Size 2 piece of terrain within Scope. They deal [10 Piercing Force] to it, and create a [Burst 1] area around it. Characters in the area must make an AGI save. Failure: [8/10/12 Force]. Success: Half damage.

name: Electric Whip
effect: On Hit: The Architect can SLIDE the target up to 2 spaces.

name: Traps
effect:
The Architect has an array of traps at their disposal, each with the TRAP tag. Traps can be deployed as a Minor Action to a free space within [Range 3]. If this support item would be destroyed, one of the trap options is instead rendered unavailable. The Architect and its allies don’t trigger its traps, but can be affected by them.
•        Sticky Trap. When triggered, the trap creates a Burst 1 area. All characters in the area must make a BLK save. Failure: They are IMMOBILIZED until cleared. Success: They are SLOWED until the end of their next turn.
•        Explosive Trap. When triggered, the trap creates a Burst 1 area. All characters in the area must make an AGI save. Failure: [8/12/16 Force]. Success: Half damage.
•        Concussion Trap. When triggered, the trap creates a [Burst 1] 1 area. All characters in the area must make a BLK save. Failure: They are DISARMED and SILENCED until the end of their next turn. Success: They are either DISARMED or SILENCED, their choice.
•        Pitfall Trap. When triggered, the trap creates a Burst 1 zone that lasts until the end of the scene. The zone is Dangerous Terrain (AGI save, [5 Physical]). Characters in the zone when it is created fall PRONE.

name: Mini Boss Actions
effect: The Mini Boss takes 2 turns each round. To determine when their 2nd turn occurs, take their initiative and add 5 to it. If this brings them over 8, roll over the remainder starting at 1. So with an initiative of 5, the Mini Boss would take turns during PHASE 2 and PHASE 5 (5+5=10, rollover to 2).

name: Amorphous
effect: The Ooze ignores difficult terrain. They can move through spaces smaller than themselves without squeezing, and can move through the spaces of other characters and end their turn in the spaces of other characters.

name: Ooze Body
effect: The Ooze has resistance to Physical damage.

name: Ooze Traits
effect: The Ooze’s extra features are added to this unit’s list of available extra features.

name: Endurance
effect: At the start of their turn, the Mini Boss clears one condition. At the end of their turn, the Mini Boss repairs one destroyed piece of equipment or technique.

name: Enhanced
effect: The unit gains +1 ACC on all checks and saves with one ability (BLK, AGI, etc.).

name: Hardened
effect: The Mini Boss gains +3 WOUND and OVERSTRESS cap.

name: Incompatible, Mini Boss
effect: The Mini Boss can’t take the Minion or Elite templates.

name: Reflexes
effect: The Mini Boss can Opportunity Attack an unlimited number of times each round.

name: Tough
effect: The Mini Boss has +5 HP.

name: Mini Boss Traits
effect: The Mini Boss can select up to three Mini Boss Extra Features, and up to two other Extra Features.

name: Bio Mine
effect: The Architect can have up to 3 of these traps deployed at a time. When triggered, it creates a Blast 1 area centered on itself. All characters in the area must make an AGI save. Failure: [3/4/5 Discord] and MARKED. Success: [1/2/3 Discord].

name: Fast Deployment
effect: The Architect can deploy two traps at once.

name: Improved Traps
effect: The Architect’s traps can be placed on any solid surface, including walls.

name: Lodestone Sling
effect: On Attack: The attack gains either PUSH 1 or PULL 1.

name: Natural Camouflage
effect: The Architect camouflages a space within Scope until the end of the scene. Characters fully within camouflaged spaces are INVISIBLE

name: Sticky Bomb
effect: One target within [Range 5] must pass an AGI save or have a sticky bomb attached to them. At the end of the target’s next turn, the bomb explodes, creating a Burst 1 area. A character adjacent to the target can attempt to disarm the bomb with a successful AGI check as a Minor Action. All characters in the area must make an AGI save. The target with the sticky bomb is affected as if they failed the save. Failure: [8/10/12 Force]. Success: Half damage.

name: Charge Attack
effect: After the Charger uses 4 RUSH, if they move at least 3 spaces and in a straight line that turn, they can make a single melee weapon attack when they end the movement as a free action.

name: Run Through
effect: On Hit: Target is WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Speed Shield
effect: When the Charger uses their Charge Attack trait, they gain resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force until the start of their next turn. They lose this effect if they become IMMOBILIZED, PRONE, or SLOWED.

name: Cannonball
effect: The Charger moves up to its Speed in a straight line. If it moves at least 3 spaces and ends its movement adjacent to an enemy, the Charger creates a Burst 1 area. All enemies in the area take [3 Physical] and must succeed on a BLK save or fall PRONE and be DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Lasso
effect: The Charger makes a melee attack against an adjacent character with a [+1/+2/+3] bonus. On a hit, they take [2 Stress], the Charger can immediately move up to its Speed, and the hit target is drug along, mirroring the Charger’s movement. This counts as forced movement.

name: Retaliation
effect: Characters that make an Opportunity Attack against the Charger become MARKED.

name: Trample
effect: When the Charger moves, they ignore ENGAGEMENT and can move through the spaces of hostile characters of their size or smaller. They deal [2/3/4 Physical] to enemies they move through, 1/turn.

name: Tipped Explosive
effect: The Charger’s Lance has its Push tag increased to 3. If a pushed character collides with another character or obstruction, they stop moving and take an additional [3/4/5 Physical].

name: Wild Charge
effect: When the Charger uses Charge Attack, before making the attack they can force the target to make a BLK save, falling PRONE on a failure.

name: Cleaver
effect: On Hit: The target loses 1 Focus. On Crit: The target loses 3 Focus.

name: Break Guard
effect: The Cleaver increases the Focus cost by 1 of any effects triggered by or targeting the Cleaver.

name: Full Attacker
effect: The Cleaver can 7 FULL ATTACK.

name: Wide Arc
effect: When the cleaver makes a melee attack, all adjacent enemies take [1 Physical].

name: Hook
effect: As a Minor Action, make a ranged attack against a character within [Range 5] with a [+1/+2/+3] bonus. On a hit, they are pulled to the closest space adjacent to the Cleaver.

name: Opportunist
effect: The Cleaver can Opportunity Attack an unlimited number of times each round.

name: Shatter Weapon
effect: When the Cleaver hits with a weapon attack, the target must pass a BLK save or be DISARMED until the end of their next turn.

name: Shred
effect: If the Cleaver hits the same target with two weapon attacks in the same turn, the target is SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.

name: Whirlwind
effect: All enemies within a [Burst 2] area of the Cleaver must make an AGI save, taking [5/6/7 Physical] and lose 1 Focus on a failure, or half damage on a success. Until the start of its next turn, any attacks against the Cleaver while adjacent to it trigger its Wide Arc trait.

name: Wind Up
effect: An adjacent character must make a BLK save. Success: They take [5/6/7 Physical] and lose 1 Focus. Fail: They take [10/12/14 Physical], lose all their Focusand are SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.

name: Advanced Targeting
effect: When an ally within Scope consumes a mark, roll a d6. On a 5-6, the mark remains.

name: Advantageous Position
effect: The Marshal creates a [Blast 2] zone within Scope. Any allies fully inside the zone gain +1 ACC on attacks, checks, and saves. This zone lasts until the end of the scene or until the Marshal uses this ability again, and persists after the Marshal’s defeat.

name: Crossbow
effect: At T2, you can attack twice with this weapon. At t3, you can attack three times.

name: Focused Attack
effect: (2) Channel: Pick an enemy within Scope and Line of Sight. (6) Release: All allies of the Marshal within [Range 5] of the target can (3) VOLLEY or (5) FIGHT with an attack against the target with +1 Difficulty.

name: Hit Them
effect: One ally in Scope can (3) VOLLEY or (5) FIGHT.

name: Inspiring Presence
effect: Adjacent allies gain +2 ACC on attacks, checks, and saves.

name: Miasma Field
effect: 6 Release: All enemies in a [Blast 1] area within Scope take [2/3/4 Stress] and are DAZED and SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Move!
effect: Each mana the Marshal spends allows one ally within Scope to move up to their speed.

name: Priority
effect: Roll 1d3+1. That many enemies within Scope are MARKED.

name: Bracing Spear
effect: The Marshal can Opportunity Attack with this weapon when a character enters this weapon’s Reach.

name: Weak Point
effect: The Marshal makes an enemy within Scope MARKED. The target take [2 Stress] and must pass a MIND save or be VULNERABLE to the first attack that consumes that mark.

name: Elemental Attunement
effect: The Elementalist is attuned to one of the four following elements: Air, Earth, Fire, and Water. When their features reference choosing an elemental effect, they can only choose an element they are attuned to.

name: Elemental Shield
effect:
The Elementalist or an ally within Scope gains 5/6/7 Temp HP, and the Elementalist chooses one of the below elemental effects. A character can only be affected by one Elemental Shield at a time, with new ones replacing the effects of the old one.
Air. The target has Resistance to Force. When they are hit by an attack that removes all their temp HP, the attacker must pass an AGI save or fall PRONE.
Earth. The target has Resistance to Physical. When they are hit by an attack that removes all their temp HP, the attacker must pass a BLK save or be SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.
Fire. The target has Resistance to Astral. When they are hit by an attack that removes all their temp HP, the attacker must pass an AGI save or take [4/5/6 Discord].
Water. The target has Resistance to Lunar. When they are hit by an attack that removes all their temp HP, the attacker must pass a MGK save or be SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Walls
effect:
The Elementalist creates a Line 3 zone in free spaces within Scope that lasts until the end of the scene. Walls can’t be adjacent to other Elementalist walls. Choose one of the following elemental effects.
Air. The zone provides Soft Cover to characters inside it. Ranged Weapon attacks can’t be made into or through the zone. 
Earth. The zone becomes pieces of Hard Cover that counts as Size 3. They are an obstruction.
Fire. Characters that start their turn within the zone or enter it for the first time during their turn take [3/4/5 Astral] + [2 Discord]
Ice. The zone counts as Difficult Terrain. Characters that start their turn within the zone or enter it for the first time during their turn must pass an AGI save or fall PRONE.

name: Dual Shields
effect: When the Elementalist uses Elemental Shield, they can spend 3 mana instead of the normal cost to target two characters at once.

name: Elemental Mastery
effect: The Elementalist can apply up to two elemental effects it knows at once.

name: Elemental Sphere
effect:
(Tags: Summon, Size ½, HP 5/8/10, Dodge/A-Def 10)
The Elementalist creates a sphere in a free space within Scope, which gains one of the below Elemental effects. As a Minor Action, the Elementalist can move the sphere up to 4 spaces in a straight line, moving through the spaces of other characters and ignoring ENGAGEMENT. Characters that it moves through must pass an AGI save become affected by its Elemental effect.
Air: Slide the target 2 spaces.
Earth: Target is knocked PRONE.
Fire: Target takes [4/5/6 Astral]
Water: Target is SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Enchanted Staff
effect:
When the Elementalist hits with their Primal Staff, they can spend 1 Mana to use one of the following Elemental effects:
Air: Attack gains PUSH 2.
Earth: Target is SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.
Fire: On Hit: Adjacent enemies gain [1 Discord].
Water: Target’s SPEED is reduced by half until the end of their next turn.

name: Improved Attunement
effect: The Elementalist becomes attuned to another element. This trait can be taken multiple times, choosing a new element each time.

name: Improved Walls
effect: The Elementalist’s Walls spell becomes a [Line 5] zone.

name: Claws
effect: On Hit: Target is grappled.

name: Gnaw
effect: The Expendable deals [5/6/7 Physical] to a grappled character.

name: Quantity Over Quality
effect: The Expendable is two separate, identical units instead of one unit. Whenever you deploy an Expendable, you deploy two instead. Expendables always count as BLOODIED and BREAKING.

name: The Pack Descends
effect: Enemies are SUNDERED while adjacent to two or more Expendables.

name: Clutch
effect: While the Expendable is grappling a target, they are unable to make attacks that don’t include the Expendable as a target. Characters that end their turn grappled by an Expendable take [2/3/4 PHYSICAL].

name: Exploder
effect: When the Expendable is defeated, they unleash a burst of energy. All characters in a Burst 1 area take [3/4/5 Force]. The Expendable can willingly defeat themselves as a Minor Action. If they do so, the damage becomes [6/8/10 Force].

name: Hunt by Scent
effect: The Expendable automatically detects any HIDDEN or INVISIBLE creatures in Scope when it uses 3 SEARCH.

name: Lash
effect: The Expendable makes a melee weapon attack with a [+1/+2/+3] bonus against a target within [Range 3]. On a hit, if the target is the same size or smaller than the Expendable, they are Pulled adjacent to the Expendable and GRAPPLED by it. If they are larger than the Expendable, it is Pulled adjacent to the target and they are GRAPPLED by the Expendable.

name: Scramble
effect: When the Expendable uses 4 RUSH, for the rest of the turn they move normally in Difficult Terrain and climbing costs half as much movement as normal.

name: Burnproof
effect: The Firebug chooses Astral or Lunar damage. They are resistant to this damage and all Discord. All of their effects that deal Astral or Lunar damage deal this damage.

name: Fuel Tank
effect: The Firebug takes [2 Stress] to regain 1 mana. When this item is destroyed, the Firebug takes [6/8/10 Piercing Force]. While this support item is destroyed, the Firebug is considered BLOODIED.

name: Uptick
effect: As a Minor Action, the Firebug can target a character within Scope that has Discord. Their level of Discord is doubled, but they don’t take any additional Discord damage from this increase.

name: Contagious
effect: Trigger: An enemy within the Firebug’s Scope fails the check to clear their Discord\nEffect: All enemies adjacent to the triggering enemy take Astral or Lunar damage equal to the level of Discord the triggering enemy has

name: Distracting Burns
effect: Whenever the Firebug gives a character Discord or increases their Discord, they become MARKED.

name: Growing Flames
effect: When an enemy within [Range 2] of the Firebug fails the check to clear their Discord, their level of Discord increases by +2 before they take the damage.

name: Siegebreaker
effect: The Firebug creates a Blast 2 area within [Range 10]. All characters in the area must make an AGI save, taking [4/6/8 Astral or Lunar] + [2 Discord] on a failure, or half as much damage and Discord on a success.

name: Ring of Fire
effect: Enemies that start their turn party within the aura take [2/3/4 {iscord]. The aura is reduced to Aura 1 while the Firebug is BLOODIED.

name: Terrify
effect: Enemies within a [Burst 2] area must make a MIND save. Failure: [4 Stress], MARKED, and DAZED. Characters can attempt to remove the DAZED condition with a MIND save as a Minor Action, removing the condition on a success, or taking an additional [1 Stress] on another failure. Success: [2 Stress] and MARKED.

name: Towering Wall
effect: The Fortress’ allies gain the benefits of cover as if the Fortress were a piece of hard cover. When an ally is fully within the Fortress’ spaces, any non-Aetheric, non-AOE attack rolls against them target the Fortress instead.

name: Harness
effect: Allies can share spaces with the fortress, and gain hard cover from its Tower Wall support item. Allies fully inside the Fortress move when it does, and are considered to have the Fortress’s size for the purposes of determining line of sight.

name: Heavy Frame
effect: The Fortress is VULNERABLE to Piercing damage, including Discord. The Fortress is immune to forced movement from smaller characters.

name: Mounted Defenses
effect: Allies fully within the Fortress’ spaces can use this weapon as a (3) VOLLEY action.\nOn Hit: The target is DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Fortified
effect: Allies fully within the Fortress’ spaces have their Armor increased by the Fortress’ Armor (max 4).

name: Murder Holes
effect: Allies fully within the Fortress’ spaces have +1 ACC on ranged attack rolls.

name: Patch Up
effect: The Fortress regains 1 HP per ally currently sharing spaces with it

name: Siege Ram
effect: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or be knocked PRONE.

name: Stomp
effect: All adjacent enemies must pass a BLK save or fall PRONE.

name: Watchtower
effect: On Hit: Target is SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.

name: Building Rage
effect: Whenever the Fury takes damage, they gain a +1 increase to their weapon damage, stacking up to +10. The Building Rage damage bonus is reduced by half when the Fury takes a Wound or Overstress.

name: Frenzied
effect: While the Fury is BLOODIED, they deal +1d6 bonus damage on crits with melee weapons. While the Fury is BREAKING, their attack targets are chosen randomly from targets within the attack’s Range or Reach.

name: Bloodthirsty
effect: The Fury gains 5 temp HP whenever they score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack.

name: Ripper
effect: On Crit: The Fury gains 5 Temp HP.

name: Barbed Armor
effect: Whenever an adjacent character hits the Fury with a weapon attack, the attacker takes [2/3/4 Physical].

name: Deadened Nerves
effect: While BLOODIED, the Fury has Resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force damage from weapons and skills. This trait is suppressed while the Fury is VULNERABLE

name: Furious Charge
effect: The Fury moves up to their Speed in a straight line, ignoring ENGAGEMENT. If they moved at least 3 spaces, they can make a single weapon attack when they end the movement.

name: I Am My Scars
effect: While BLOODIED, the Fury gains 2 stacks of Building Rage whenever they would gain 1.

name: Lash Out
effect: Trigger: The Fury takes damage not caused by itself.\nEffect: The Fury can (3) VOLLEY or (5) FIGHT with a melee weapon

name: Bounce Shield
effect: Trigger: An attack targets an ally within [Range 3].\nEffect: The attack gains +2 DIF.

name: Cestus
effect: The Gladiator can attack twice with this weapon. At T2 they can attack three times, and at T3 they can attack four times. \nOn Crit: The Gladiator can automatically succeed on a 5 SHOVE against the target as a Free Action.

name: Electric Net
effect: The Gladiator throws an electrically charged net at a target within [Range 3]. The Target must pass an AGI save or be IMMOBILIZED until cleared. While IMMOBILIZED in this way, the target is unable to take Reactions. The IMMOBILIZED target can remove the condition by succeeding on a BLK save as a Minor Action.

name: Swap
effect: The Gladiator swaps positions with an adjacent character, which counts as forced movement. If the Gladiator and the target are different sizes, the Gladiator can place themselves or the target in any spaces the other occupied, as long as both remain adjacent to each other. The Gladiator can’t use this ability if they are GRAPPLED, IMMOBILIED, or SLOWED.

name: Call Out
effect: At the start of the Gladiator’s turn, they can (3) MARK all adjacent enemies as a Free Action.

name: Glory or Death
effect: Enemies within a [Burst 3] area of the Gladiator are MARKED, and have +1 DIF on attack rolls that don’t include Gladiator as a target while they have this mark.

name: Pit Fighter
effect: The Gladiator deals [4/5/6 Physical] with (5) IMPROVISED ATTACK, and +1d6 bonus damage with reaction attacks. When the Gladiator uses (5) SHOVE, they get to use both options and can Push the target up to 3 spaces.

name: Ricochet Shield
effect: On Hit: The shield bounces. The Gladiator can repeat the attack against another target within [Range 3] of the hit target. This effect can trigger multiple times, but each character can only be targeted 1/turn.

name: Trident
effect: On Hit: The target is pinned by the weapon, and is IMMOBILIZED while pinned. The weapon can’t be used to attack while pinning the target. The effect ends if the Gladiator ends this effect as a Free Action, the weapon is destroyed, or the target succeeds on a BLK save as a Minor Action. The weapon returns to the Gladiator when the effect ends.

name: Backup Weapons
effect: The Gunner has a number of weapons (“eyes”) equal to their maximum mana. If the Gunner would be DISARMED or have a weapon or support item destroyed, they instead lose 2 mana and their maximum mana is reduced by 2.

name: Repeater
effect: 1/turn before attacking, the Gunner can spend 1 mana to attack twice with this weapon, choosing either the same or different targets. This weapon’s damage is equal to the Gunner’s current mana.

name: Special Bullets
effect: 1/turn before attacking, the Gunner can spend 1 mana to apply a Special Bullet to one of their Repeater attacks. Each special bullet counts as a separate feature and a separate support item.

name: Steady Reloading
effect: At the start of the Gunner’s turn, if they haven’t moved since the start of their last turn, they regain 1 mana.

name: Antimagic Field Generator
effect: The Gunner creates a Blast 2 zone within Scope. Characters are SILENCED while at least partly within the zone. The zone lasts until the Gunner uses this ability again, or is BLINDED or STUNNED

name: Flight
effect: The unit can fly.

name: Special Bullets: Charm
effect: On Hit: Target must pass a MIND save or the Gunner picks one of the following: a) The Gunner moves them up to their Speed, controlling their movement, which counts as forced movement, or b) Target uses (3) VOLLEY or (5) FIGHT as a reaction with a weapon or technique attack of the Gunner’s choice against a target of the Gunner’s choice.

name: Special Bullets: Death
effect: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or take 1 WOUND instead of the normal damage.

name: Special Bullets: Dissolving
effect: On Hit: Target is SUNDERED until cleared.

name: Special Bullets: Fear
effect: On Hit: Target is DAZED until they end their turn HIDDEN or out of the Guner’s Line of Sight.

name: Special Bullets: Freezing
effect: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Special Bullets: Drill
effect: On Attack: This attack ignores soft and hard cover from terrain, and gains PIERCING.\nOn Hit: Deals double damage to summons, objects, and terrain.

name: Special Bullets: Slow
effect: On Hit: Target is SLOWED until the end of their next turn.

name: Special Bullets: Stun
effect: On Hit: Target must pass a BLK save or be STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

name: Special Bullets: Weakening
effect: On Hit: Target is WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Bless
effect: One ally within Scope becomes blessed. They gain +1 ACC on attacks, checks, and saves, and deal +1d6 bonus damage on a critical hit. This effect lasts until the Healer is, defeated, or uses this ability again.

name: Flash Heal
effect: One character within Scope regains 4/5/6 HP.

name: Heal
effect: 6 Release: One character within Scope regains 10/15/20 HP.

name: Rebuking Word
effect: On Hit: Until the end of their next turn, the target takes [2 Stress] whenever they make an attack.

name: Drain Strength
effect: When the Healer makes a character MARKED, the target must pass a MAGIC save or be WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Dual Cast
effect: The Healer can spend +1 mana when releasing Heal to target two characters at once.

name: Healing Zone
effect: 6 Release: Create a Blast 1 zone within Scope.  Allies that start their turn within the zone regain 4/5/6 HP. The zone lasts until the Healer is defeated or uses this ability again.

name: Relief
effect: Remove all conditions and negative effects that aren’t a status from one character within Scope. They can immediately Shift up to their speed.

name: Resurrect
effect: Channel: The Healer names an ally that was defeated this scene.\n6 Release: The character returns to play adjacent to the Healer, or in the closest free space. They return as if they were a new unit, but their HP and Stress are at their BLOODIED and BREAKING values. They are defeated if they take a WOUND or exceed their Stress cap.

name: Shield
effect: 6 Release: One ally within Scope gains a protective shield. The next time they would take damage or Stress, (after Armor and resistance), reduce the damage or Stress to 0.

name: Enthrall
effect: (6)  Release: The Mindreaver can move one enemy within Scope and Line of Sight up to their speed (which doesn’t count as forced movement). The Mindreaver can then force the target to make a weapon or spell attack (of the Mindreaver’s choice) as a reaction against a target chosen by the Mindreaver.

name: Mind Worms
effect: On Hit: Target is DAZED until they clear all their Discord.

name: Read Mind
effect: (6) Release: One character within Scope takes [2 Stress] and becomes Predictable. While Predictable, they can’t SURGE. At the start of each round, Predictable characters must pick which Phase they are going to take their turn in that round. If they take their turn in any other Phase, they take [4 Stress] at the start of that turn and are no longer Predictable. During one of their predicted turns, a Predictable character can attempt a MND save as a Minor Action to remove this effect.

name: Spread Nightmare
effect: The Mindreaver picks an enemy within Scope that has Discord. All enemies adjacent to the target must pass a MND save or be auto-hit by Mind Worms.

name: Balance
effect: The Mindreaver selects two characters within Scope. They can move all Stress from one of the characters to the other.

name: Brain Drill
effect: This weapon auto-hits GRAPPLED targets.\nOn Hit: Target loses 1 mana. On Crit: Target loses all of their mana.\n

name: Focused
effect: 1/turn the Mindreaver can take 1 Stress to reroll an attack, check, or save.

name: Hamper
effect: On Hit: Target must make a MND save. Fail: Target is DISARMED or SILENCED until the end of their next turn, Mindreaver’s choice.

name: Mind Spike
effect: This attack deals +2 Stress if the target is BREAKING.

name: Pain
effect: 6 Release: One target within Scope takes [2 Stress] and must make a MND save. Fail: Target is STUNNED until the end of their next turn. Success: Target is DISARMED and SILENCED until the end of their next turn.

name: Displacement
effect: The Mirage is INVISIBLE. They lose INVISIBLE until the start of their next turn when they take damage or while STUNNED.

name: Flicker Blade
effect: On Attack: If the Mirage isn’t IMMOBILIZED or SLOWED, they can switch places with the target, teleporting both of them. This counts as forced movement on the other target.

name: Phantasm Terrain
effect: 2 CHANNEL: The Mirage choses 4 free spaces within Scope that aren’t adjacent to each other and creates an illusion in them that lasts while Channeling. Enemies that enter one of these spaces take [2 Stress] and remove the illusion from the space.\n6 Release: Each illusion deals [2 Stress] to enemies that are inside or adjacent to their space, and makes them SLOWED until the end of their next turn. The Mirage can choose for the spaces to become either a) normal terrain, b) Size 1 pieces of hard cover, c) difficult terrain, or d) dangerous terrain (AGI check, 5 Force).

name: Redirect
effect: Trigger: The Mirage is hit by an attack and isn’t IMMOBILIZED or SLOWED.\nEffect: The Mirage switches places with another character within [Range 3], who takes the hit instead. This counts as forced movement teleportation. If the target is an enemy, they must pass a MGK save or this effect fails.

name: Cloaking Field
effect: While the Mirage is INVISIBLE, adjacent allies have soft cover.

name: Endless Maze
effect: 6 Release: One enemy within Scope takes [2/3/4 Stress] and is BLINDED until cleared and MARKED. A character BLINDED by this ability can attempt to clear it if they allow the Mirage to control their standard movement. Whenever they allow this to happen, they can make a MND save at the end of that turn to clear the BLINDED condition.

name: Conceal
effect: An ally within Scope becomes INVISIBLE until the end of their next turn.

name: Masque
effect: 1 ally within Scope appears like one of the PCs. Until the start of the Mirage’s next turn, any enemy that attacks or targets this ally with a hostile effect takes [2 Stress].

name: Replace
effect: (Tags: Summon, 1 HP, Dodge/A-Def 10, Size = Target’s size).\nMinor: 1 ally within Scope can move up to their speed. A decoy illusion is created in their starting space, which is a SUMMON. The ally is always HIDDEN while the decoy remains and they are within [Range 10] of it.

name: Reveal Position
effect: 6 Release: The Mirage targets up to two allies within Scope. The Mirage can either swap their places with each other (counting as a teleport), or teleport them 4 spaces. The Mirage can target itself with this ability in place of an ally.

name: Eye in the Sky
effect: The Overlord MARKS a character within Scope.

name: Flight
effect: The unit can fly.

name: Manawell
effect: On Hit: Target is MARKED.

name: Stressful Gaze
effect: 6 Release: All enemies in scope take [2/3/4 Stress], or an additional +2 Stress if they’re MARKED.

name: Hailstorm
effect: 2 CHANNEL: Pick a point within Scope and create a Blast 1 zone that lasts while Channeling. The zone is difficult terrain. 6 Release: All characters within the zone must make an AGI save, taking [8/9/10 Lunar] and be SLOWED until the end of their next turn on a failure, or half damage on a success.

name: Momentum
effect: When an ally within Scope of the Overlord consumes a mark, they can Shift up to their speed.

name: Nimbus
effect: On Hit: Target has +2 DIF on all ranged attacks until the end of their next turn.

name: Propel
effect: The Overlord targets one character within Scope it can see. If the character is an ally, they can fly up to 6 spaces in a straight line. If the character is an enemy, they must pass a MGK save or be either PUSHED or PULLED 6 spaces in a straight line.

name: Thunderbolt
effect: This weapon does double damaging when consuming a MARK.

name: Uprising
effect: An ally within Scope gains Flying until the end of the ally’s next turn.

name: Breaker
effect: 1/round when the Pegasus makes an enemy BLOODIED, they must pass a MGK save or be DISARMED until the end of their next turn. 1/round when the Pegasus makes an enemy BREAKING, they must pass a BLK save or be SILENCED until the end of their next turn.

name: Flight
effect: The unit can fly.

name: Sunrise
effect: On Hit: The target is BLINDED until the end of their next turn.

name: Aerial Punishment
effect: Trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against the Pegasus.\nEffect: The Pegasus can make an attack against them after their attack resolves. \n

name: Celestial Protection
effect: Spell attacks against the Pegasus have +1 DIF, and the Pegasus has Resistance to Stress from other characters.

name: Divine Gate
effect: On Hit: Until the end of the target’s next turn, whenever they make an attack, they take Stress equal to the distance between them and their attacked target.

name: Pristine Blessing
effect: The Pegasus regains 2/3/4 HP at the end of each of its turns if there are no enemies within [Range 5] of it.

name: Sky Warrior
effect: 1/round the Pegasus deals +1d6 bonus damage on a critical hit. The Pegasus can clear a condition on itself or an ally within [Range 5] whenever it scores a critical hit.

name: Escort
effect: Until the start of its next turn, whenever an adjacent ally moves, the Protector can move along with the ally up to its Speed, staying adjacent to the ally.

name: Shield Wall
effect: The Protector provides cover as if it were a piece of hard cover. The Protector gains resistance to all damage until the start of its next turn.

name: Sword and Shield
effect: This weapon’s damage is increased by the phase number it is used in (+1 for PHASE 1, etc.).

name: Vigilant Gaze
effect: Trigger: An ally within [Range 3] is targeted by an attack.\nEffect: The Protector can move up to 2 spaces and can either a) become the target of the attack if they are adjacent to the ally, or b) make a weapon attack against the attacker before the triggering attack happens.

name: Armored Zone
effect: The Protector gains an Aura until the start of its next turn. Allies gain +2/+3/+4 Armor while fully within the aura, to a max of 4 Armor.

name: Pinning Attack
effect: If the Protector hits with a reaction attack, the target’s movement stops and they are unable to move for the rest of the turn.

name: Retaliatory Stance
effect: The Protector deals [3/4/5 Physical] to any character that hits the Protector with a melee weapon. This ability is suppressed while the Protector is DISARMED, STUNNED, or GRAPPLED.

name: Sidearm
effect: This weapon gains +1 ACC and deals +3 damage when not used during 1 BOLSTER.

name: Threatening Attacks
effect: When the Protector hits with a reaction attack, the target becomes MARKED.

name: Waste Energy
effect: A character that hits the Protector with a melee attack becomes WEAKENED until the end of their next turn. This ability is suppressed while the Protector is DISARMED, STUNNED, or GRAPPLED.

name: Bear Trap
effect: The Ranger deploys a bear trap in a free adjacent space. When activated, the triggering character must pass an AGI save or be IMMOBILIZED. A character IMMOBILIZED by this trap can attempt a BLK save as a Minor Action to remove it. The Ranger can only have 3 bear traps deployed at a time.

name: Explosive Shot
effect: The Ranger can spend 1 mana to add [Blast 1] to their next Marksman Bow attack.

name: Favored Foe
effect: The Ranger targets an enemy in the scene that is MARKED. 1/round they can reroll an attack roll against that target. This effect lasts until the Ranger uses this ability again.

name: Flush Them Out
effect: If the target ends their next turn adjacent to a piece of cover, they take [4/6/8 Astral].

name: Hunter`s Mark
effect: 1/turn when the Ranger consumes a Mark and successfully hits their target, they can spend 1 mana to deal +1d6 bonus damage.

name: Homing Shot
effect: The Ranger’s ranged weapon attacks against MARKED characters gain the Homing and Reliable 3/4/5 tags. The Ranger must consume the mark to gain these benefits.

name: Marksman Bow
effect: On Miss: Target is MARKED.

name: Snap Shot
effect: When the ranger uses 4 RUSH or 4 HIDE, they can deal [2/3/4 Piercing Physical] to an enemy within Scope. This doesn’t break the HIDDEN.

name: Sure Foot
effect: The Ranger moves normally in Difficult Terrain.

name: Twin Blades
effect: The Ranger can attack twice with this weapon. They can Shift 1 space before, between, or after each attack.

name: Flanking
effect: The Rouge has +1 ACC on attacks when an ally is adjacent to the target.

name: Shifty
effect: Trigger: The Rogue is hit or missed by an attack and isn’t IMMOBILIZED or SLOWED.\nEffect: The Rogue can Shift 2 and 4 HIDE if they end this movement next to or in cover.

name: Stalker
effect: Rogues are HIDDEN when deployed. They gain +1 Accuracy on attacks while HIDDEN, and can become HIDDEN when they crit with a weapon attack.

name: Shiv
effect: If the target has a condition, this weapon deals +3 damage and gains Piercing. The Rogue doesn’t need to pick up this weapon after throwing it before using it again.This weapon deals +3 damage and gains the Piercing tag against enemies that have a condition.

name: Black Lotus Poison
effect: When the Rogue hits with a weapon attack, the target must pass a MND save or gain [1 Discord]. Until they clear their Discord, they can’t use the REROLL TABLE.

name: Blinding Poison
effect: When the Rogue hits with a weapon attack, the target must pass a BLK save or be BLINDED. The target can repeat the save as a Minor Action to end this condition.

name: Deadly Crit
effect: When the Rogue crits with an attack, they deal +1d6 bonus damage and treat the attack as if it were PIERCING.

name: Smoke Bomb
effect: The Rogue creates a [Blast 1] zone centered on itself. Characters fully inside the zone are INVISIBLE. The zone lasts until end of the Rogue’s next turn.

name: Assassin`s Crossbow
effect: On Hit: The target is DAZED until cleared.

name: Trap Master
effect: The Rogue does not trigger traps, and can automatically disarm them as a Minor Action. They can automatically unlock locks.

name: Arcanum Shield
effect: Trigger: An ally within [Range 3] takes Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force damage (after Armor and Resistance).\nEffect: The ally takes half of the damage, and the Spellshield takes the other half.

name: Magic Resistance
effect: The Spellshield has Resistance to all damage and Stress from spells.

name: Mana Drain
effect: On Hit: Target loses 2 mana. The Spellshield regains mana equal to the amount lost.

name: Spellward
effect: The Spellshield targets an ally within Scope. 1/round the Spellshield can trigger their Arcanum Shield reaction for that ally at any range. Only one ally can have a Spellward at a time.

name: Aethercaster
effect: This weapon deals bonus damage equal to the mana the target currently has.

name: Break Spell
effect: Trigger: An enemy within Scope takes a (2) CHANNEL action.\nEffect: The Spellshield can make a weapon or spell attack against them.

name: Pain Prod
effect: On Hit: Target has +2 DIF on Concentration saves triggered by this attack.

name: Reflect
effect: Trigger: The Spellshield or an ally within [Range 3 is missed by a spell attack.\nEffect: The Spellshield reflects the spell back at the caster, auto-hitting them with it.

name: Improved Mana Drain
effect: The Spellshield can exceed its maximum mana with the mana gained from Mana Drain.

name: Silence
effect: 6 Release: One enemy in Scope takes [3/4/5 Stress] and is SILENCED until cleared.

name: Ghillie Suit
effect: Minor: The Sniper becomes INVISIBLE until the start of its next turn.

name: Sniper Shot
effect: Channel: The Sniper selects an enemy within line of sight. They cannot use their Compound Bow while channeling this ability. \nRelease: The Sniper makes a Compound Bow attack against the selected enemy. If they do not have cover against the Sniper, the attack deals +5 damage on a hit.

name: Steady Shot
effect: If the sniper hasn’t moved since the start of their last turn, they gain +1 ACC on their next ranged attack.

name: Absolute Precision
effect: When the Sniper scores a critical hit with the Fusion Rifle, the damage can’t be reduced in any way except for immunity.

name: Spectral Arrow
effect: When the Sniper attacks with their Fusion Rifle, they can change the Range to a Line 25 AOE.

name: Scan Movement
effect: Trigger: An enemy within line of sight ends a movement without benefiting from cover against the Sniper.\nEffect: The Sniper can attack the target with a ranged weapon.

name: Seeker Shot
effect: The Sniper’s next Compound Bow attack ignores all sources of Difficulty.

name: Capacitor Core
effect: If the Sniper loses Concentration on their Fusion Rifle before firing, they can still fire it during PHASE 6: 6 RELEASE, but it doesn’t gain the increased damage from Channeling.

name: Ethereal Shift
effect: The Specter becomes INVISIBLE until the start of its next turn.

name: Frighten
effect: One character in Scope must pass a MND save or take [3/4/5 Stress] and be unable to willingly move closer to the Specter until the end of their next turn

name: Incorporeal
effect: The Specter ignores ENGAGEMENT and doesn’t cause ENGAGEMENT. It can move through the spaces of other characters, objects, and terrain, but it can’t end its turn in these spaces. The Specter ignores difficult terrain and dangerous terrain.

name: Wither
effect: On Hit: Target is WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Chilling Phase
effect: When the specter moves through an enemy, they must pass a BLK save or be SLOWED until the end of their next turn. Each enemy can only be affected by this ability 1/turn.

name: Drain Life Force
effect: Enemies that end their turn adjacent to the Specter take [3/4/5 Piercing Lunar], and the Specter regains that much HP.

name: Possess
effect:
Release: An enemy within the Specter’s Scope becomes possessed by the Specter. While possessing an enemy, the Specter is removed from play, doesn’t take turns, and cannot be targeted or affected by anything. However, the Specter takes any STRESS the target takes, and any hits against the target’s A-Def hit the Specter instead. 
When the possessed enemy starts a turn, the Specter takes [1 Stress and chooses one of the following: A) The enemy takes two actions this turn. The Specter chooses the 2nd action, which must be an action that can be used this Phase, and chooses any targets. B) The Specter controls their Standard Movement, used at the start of their turn.
Possession lasts until the Specter ends it at the end of another character’s turn, or when the Specter takes a WOUND or OVERSTRESS. The Specter then returns to play in a free space adjacent to the possessed target.

name: Reform
effect: The Specter is removed from play. At the start of the next round, they return to play in any free space in the scene.

name: Stressful Environment
effect: Trigger: An enemy within Scope uses the REROLL TABLE.\nEffect: They take [2 Stress].

name: Wail
effect: All enemies in a Burst 2 must make a MND save. Failure: They take [4/5/6 Stress] and are IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn. Success: They take [2/3/4 Stress].

name: Conjure Conscript
effect: (Tags: Summon, Size ½, HP 5/8/10, Dodge/A-Def 10) \nThe Summoner creates two Conscripts in free spaces within Scope. The Summoner can have up to 6 conscripts at a time. During the Summoner’s turn, but not the turn they were summoned, conscripts make a ranged weapon attack against the closest enemy within [Range 8] with a +1/+2/+3 bonus, dealing [4/5/6 Physical] on a hit. All Conscripts are defeated when their summoner is defeated

name: Drag Down
effect: 6 Release: The Summoner creates a Blast 1 area in Scope. Enemies in the are choose one of the following: A) They take [2/3/4 Stress] and are VULNERABLE until the end of their next turn. B) They take [6/8/10 Force] and are DISARMED until the end of their next turn.

name: Focus Fire
effect: When the Summoner marks an enemy, their conscripts will attack that target this round instead of the nearest one, if possible.

name: Seize Command
effect: The Summoner targets an enemy Summon within Scope. The creator of that Summon must pass a MAGIC save or the Summoner gains command of it. Its allegiance is switched, treating its former allies as enemies and its former enemies as allies. These effects last until the end of the Summoner’s next turn.\nThe original summoner can’t dismiss or resummon the summon while commanded by the Summoner.

name: Bodyguard
effect: Conscripts can INTERPOSE 1/round each, and they don’t need Focus to do so.

name: Dual Summon
effect: The Summoner can summon two Conscripts with Conjure Conscript, but they only have 1 HP.

name: Improved Summons
effect:
When the Summoner creates a Conscript, they can choose one of the following improvements for it. As a Minor Action, they can give an existing Conscript within Scope one of these improvements. A Conscript can only have one improvement at a time.
Mage. When the Conscript attacks a target, enemies adjacent to the target take [2/3/4 Force].
Rogue. Conscript gains Reliable 2/3/4 on its attacks.
Tank. Conscript gains 3 Armor.
Warrior. Conscript auto-hits adjacent enemies.

name: Mana Tap
effect: On Hit: The Summoner regains 2 Mana.

name: Rupture
effect: 6 Release: All of the Summoner’s summons create a Burst 1 area. All enemies in one of these zones must make an AGI save. Failure: [4/6/8 Lunar] + [3/4/5 Discord] per area they are in. Success: [2/3/4 Lunar] + [1/2/3 Discord] per area they are in.

name: Transposition
effect: The Summoner can teleport all conscripts of their choice within Scope up to 4 spaces.

name: Drones
effect: (Tags: Summon, Size 1/2, 1 HP, 10 Dodge/A-Def) The Swarm summons a drone within Scope, which emits a [Burst 1] zone. Enemies are DAZED while partly within the zone. The Swarm can have an unlimited number of drones summoned at a time.

name: Surging Host
effect: On Hit: Target is MARKED.

name: Swarm Body
effect: The Swarm is surrounded by a [Burst 2] zone. Allies partly within the zone gain Soft Cover. Enemies that start their turn in the zone or enter it for the first time during their turn take [2/3/4 Stress]. The zone is suppressed while the Swarm is STUNNED.\nIf the Swarm has 1 Wound/Overstress cap, while they are BLOODIED, their size is reduced to 1 (unless it was already smaller) and the zone becomes [Burst 1]. \nIf the Swarm has more than 1 Wound/Overstress cap, their size and zone is reduced when they’ve taken Wounds/Overstress equal to half their cap.

name: Swarm Form
effect: The Swarm is VULNERABLE to Discord and damage from AOEs. Grapples against the Swarm automatically fail, and the Swarm can automatically break free from grapples as a free action.

name: Choking Swarm
effect: The Swarm chooses DISARMED or SILENCED. All enemies in the Swarm’s Swarm Body zone must make a BULK save. Failure: [2 Stress] and they gain the chosen condition until the end of their next turn. Success: [2 Stress].

name: Clutching Swarm
effect: The Swarm can make a GRAPPLE attack against a character within its Swarm Body zone. On a hit, they are SLID to any free space adjacent to the Swarm. Alternatively, one of the Swarm’s drones can make a normal GRAPPLE attack.

name: Crawling Swarm
effect: As a Minor Action, the Swarm can move one of their drones up to 2 spaces.

name: Infestation
effect: On Hit: The target becomes Infested. Whenever they make an attack, they gain [1/2/3 Discord]. This effect can stack, increasing the Discord by +1. An Infested character can remove this effect by succeeding on a BLK save as a Minor Action, or by taking the 1 REFRESH action.

name: Obscuring Swarm
effect: Allies fully within the Swarm’s Swarm Body zone can HIDE as a Minor Action. Enemies are BLINDED while within the zone.

name: Shredding Swarm
effect: When an enemy starts their turn in the Swarm’s Swarm Body zone, they take [1/2/3 Physical] and must pass a BLK save or be SUNDERED until the end of their next turn.

name: Armor Plating
effect: The Titan has Resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force damage from characters within [Range 3] of it.

name: Full Attacker
effect: The Titan can 7 FULL ATTACK.

name: Giga Hammer
effect: On Hit: The target must succeed on a BLK save or be STUNNED until the end of their next turn.

name: Heavy
effect: The Titan is immune to forced movement from smaller characters.

name: Unstoppable
effect: The Titan can end its turn sharing spaces with objects and terrain that are smaller than it. If it ends its turn sharing spaces with other characters, they are Pushed to the nearest unoccupied spaces outside of the Titan’s spaces.

name: Danger Zone
effect: Enemies that start their turn adjacent to the Titan take [3/4/5 Physical], or twice as much damage if the enemy is BREAKING.

name: Gravity Pull
effect: All enemies within a [Burst 3] area of the Titan must succeed on a BLK save or be Pulled to the closest empty space adjacent to it.

name: Intimidation
effect: A character within the Titan’s Scope must make a MND save. Failure: [2/3/4 Stress] and SLOWED until the end of their next turn. Success: [1/2/3 Stress].

name: Marked for Destruction
effect: Enemies that start their turn adjacent to the Titan are MARKED.

name: Pain Conversion
effect: Trigger: The Titan takes damage or Stress.\nEffect: The Titan gains +1 ACC on their next Giga Hammer attack. This effect stacks until the Titan makes a Giga Hammer attack.

name: Ram
effect: 2 CHANNEL: The Titan can’t willingly move while Channeling. \n6 Release: The Titan moves up to twice its Speed in a straight line, ignoring Reactions and ENGAGEMENT. Characters it enters the space of during this movement are Pushed outside of its space and must make an AGI save. Failure: [4/6/8 Physical] and knocked PRONE. Success: [2/3/4 Stress].

name: Barrel Roll
effect: Trigger: The Vulture is hit with an attack.\nEffect: The attack misses and the Vulture can fly up to 3 spaces.\n

name: Flier
effect: The Unit can fly.

name: Dive Bomb
effect: The Vulture can fly up to twice its speed in a straight line, moving through the spaces of enemies. Once during this movement, one enemy it moves through must make an AGI save. Failure: [4/6/8 Physical] and they are SUNDERED until the end of their next turn and knocked PRONE. Success: [2/3/4 Physical].

name: Evasive Maneuvers
effect: Reaction attacks against the Vulture automatically miss unless the attacker spends +1 Focus, which lets them reaction attack as normal.

name: Heavenly Chains
effect: (Tags: Summon, Size ½, HP=5, DODGE/A-DEF=10)\nThe Vulture summons a pillar of chains in a free space within scope. Any enemy that starts their turn adjacent to the pillar must pass a BLK save or be IMMOBILIZED and WEAKENED. These conditions last as long as a character is adjacent to the pillar.

name: Lost Fog
effect: The Blast area of this attack becomes a lingering zone. Characters fully within the zone are BLINDED while inside, and Line of Sight can’t be drawn through the zone. The zone lasts until the Vulture uses this spell again, or is defeated.

name: Lure
effect: 6 Release: One character in Scope takes [2/3/4 Stress], is SILENCED until the end of their next turn, immediately moves their speed straight toward the Vulture, and must make a MND save. Failure: The target is also DAZED until cleared. While DAZED, all of the target’s movement during their turn must be directly toward the Vulture, and they must move at least 1 space during their turn. This ability can’t be used while the Vulture is STUNNED or SILENCED, and all existing effects end if it is.

name: Skitter Bomb
effect: (Size ½, 3 HP, 10 Dodge/A-Def, 3 Speed) The Vulture creates this Summon within Scope. The summon can willingly be detonated by the Vulture as a Free Action, creating a [Burst 1] area. It can’t detonate on the same turn it is created. All characters in the area must make an AGILITY save. Failure: [8/10/12 Force]. Success: Half damage.

name: Vacuum Generator
effect: The Vulture creates a Line 10 area. All characters in the area must make a BLK save, starting with the characters furthest down the line. Failure: [4/6/8 Force] and PUSH to the furthest free space in the line. Success: [2/3/4 Force] and PUSH 1].

name: Battlemage
effect: 1/turn the Warmage can spend 1 mana to reroll a Concentration save.

name: Flamestrike
effect: 6 Release: Create a Blast 2 area within Scope. Characters in the area are automatically hit by a spell attack, taking [5/7/9 Astral] + [2/3/4 Discord].

name: Power Word KILL
effect: 6 Release: One character in Scope makes a BLK save. Fail: They gain 1 wound. Success: They take [4/5/6 Stress].

name: Chain Death
effect: 6 Release: Choose up to 3 different characters within Scope, and designate them as target 1, target 2, and target 3. Draw a straight line from target 1 to target 2, and from target 2 to target 3. These characters, and any targets within one of these lines, must make a MGK save. Failure: [6/7/8 Lunar] and targets are WEAKENED until they regain any HP. Success: Half damage and WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Cone of Cold
effect: 6 Release: Create a [Close Blast 3] area. All characters in the area take [8/10/12 Lunar] and must succeed on a BLK save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn. While IMMOBILIZED by this ability, targets are VULNERALBE to Physical damage.

name: Escape
effect: As their standard movement, the Warmage can teleport up to 6 spaces.

name: Mind Fog
effect: On Hit: The target is DAZED and treats the Warmage as INVISIBLE until the DAZED condition is cleared.

name: Mirror Self
effect: (Tags: Summon, Size = Warmage’s Size, HP=5, Dodge/A-Def=10)\nMinor: The Warmage creates an illusory copy of themselves as a Summon within Scope. Whenever the Warmage uses a spell or ability, they can use the summon’s position instead of their own for determining line of sight, Range, and cover.

name: Wave of Death
effect: 6 Release: All enemies within a Burst 2 area must make a MGK save. Failure: [10/15/20 Lunar] and target is unable to regain HP until the end of their next turn. Success: [5/8/10 Lunar].

name: Celestial Traits
effect: The Celestial’s extra features are added to this unit’s list of available extra features.

name: Banish
effect: 6 Release: One enemy within Scope must make a MGK save. Failure: Until they end of their next turn, they are unaffected by and cannot affect other characters, including damage, Stress, engagement, obstructions, etc. Existing elements like traps and summons are unaffected. Success: They are SLOWED and WEAKENED until the end of their next turn.

name: Celestial Nature
effect: The Celestial has resistance to Astral damage.

name: Divine Shield
effect: One character within Scope gains 5 temp HP.

name: Flight
effect: The unit can fly

name: Healing Aura
effect: Allies that start their turn partly within this aura regain 2 HP.

name: Unblemished
effect: The Celestial is immune to Discord.

name: Chromatic Scales
effect: The Dragon gains either Astral or Lunar resistance.

name: Natural Weapons
effect: This weapon can be used while DISARMED.

name: Dragon Traits
effect: The Dragon’s extra features are added to this unit’s list of available extra features.

name: Breath Weapon
effect: The Dragon breathes energy in either a [Line 10] or [Close Blast 2] area, chosen when this skill is selected. All characters in the area must make an AGI save. Failure: [8/10/12 Astral or Lunar] Success: [4/5/6 Astral or Lunar].

name: Change Size
effect: Minor: The dragon can change its size to any size between ½ and 3, or back to its normal size.

name: Draconic Bloodline
effect: When the Dragon rolls a recharge die, they can spend mana to increase the result by 1 for every mana spent.

name: Energy Aura
effect: Characters that start their turn adjacent to the Dragon take [2/3/4 Astral or Lunar]. This effect is suppressed while the Dragon is STUNNED.

name: Flight
effect: The unit can fly

name: Swallow
effect: The Dragon makes a melee attack against an adjacent character smaller than it with a [+2/+4/+6] bonus. On a success, the target is swallowed and moved into the Dragon’s space. They are DAZED and IMMOBILIZED, and unable to draw Line of Sight outside of the dragon’s space. They move when the Dragon moves. A swallowed creature can make a BLK save as an action during any Phase to break free of the dragon, or are freed when it takes a WOUND / OVERSTRESS.

name: Elemental Nature
effect: The Elemental chooses Astral or Lunar damage. They gain immunity to the type they selected, and all of their abilities that deal either Astral or Lunar damage deal that type of damage. The Elemental is VULNERABLE to the other damage type.

name: Elemental Traits
effect: The Elemental’s extra features are added to this unit’s list of available extra features.

name: Death Burst
effect: When the Elemental is defeated, they unleash a burst of energy in a [Burst 2] area. All enemies in the area must make an AGI save. Failure: 4/5/6 Astral or Lunar]. Success: [2/3/3 Astral or Lunar].

name: Elemental Nimbus
effect: Enemies treat the aura as difficult terrain.

name: Energy Absorption
effect: When the Elemental takes Astral or Lunar damage that it is immune to, it regains that much damage as HP. Any excess healing becomes temp HP.

name: Energy Form
effect: The Elemental can move through the spaces of other characters, ignoring ENGAGEMENT and dealing [2/3/4 Astral or Lunar] 1/turn to an enemy it does so to.

name: Elite Actions
effect: The Elite takes 2 turns each round. To determine when their 2nd turn occurs, take their initiative and add 5 to it. If this brings them over 8, roll over the remainder starting at 1. So with an initiative of 5, the Elite would take turns during PHASE 2 and PHASE 5 (5+5=10, rollover to 2).

name: Enhanced
effect: The unit gains +1 ACC on all checks and saves with one ability (BLK, AGI, etc.).

name: Incompatible, Elite
effect: The Elite can’t take the Minion or Mini Boss template.

name: Sturdy
effect: The Elite gains +1 WOUND and OVERSTRESS cap.

name: Elite Traits
effect: The Elite can select an additional Extra Feature.

name: Incompatible, Minion
effect: The Minion can’t take the Veteran, Elite, or Mini Boss templates.

name: One Hit
effect: The Minion has 1 HP and 1 Stress Cap, and can`t have more than 1 HP and Stress Cap. When they take any damage or Stress not caused by themselves, they are defeated. A Minion that succeeds on a save takes no damage from the effect, even if it would normally deal damage or Stress on a successful save.

name: Minion Traits
effect: Minions can’t have more than 1 WOUND or OVERSTRESS. The Minion extra features are added to this unit’s list of available extra features.

name: Fanatical
effect: When an adjacent ally would take damage or Stress, the minion can take the damage for them as a REACTION. The minion can’t use this ability if they are STUNNED or IMMOBILIZED.

name: Hard Fall
effect: The Mounted is VULNERABLE while PRONE.

name: Gallop
effect: Whenever the Mounted starts a movement, all that movement must be in a straight line, although they still can split up their movement between actions. \nThe Mounted can’t climb. As a Minor Action, they can (4) RUSH and choose the ‘ignore ENGAGEMENT and do not provoke reactions’ option.

name: Mounted Speed

name: Acid Body

The copies enter as new characters, with no preexisting conditions or effects. Their HP maximum is equal to their BLOODIED value, minus any carryover damage from the WOUND, and their size is 1 smaller than their original size (to a minimum of ½). The copies can’t take more than 1 turn each a round.

effect:
This trait is taken in combination with the Mini Boss template, and replaces the Hardened trait.
The Ooze’s size increases by +1.
When the Ooze would be defeated by a WOUND, it instead splits into two copies of itself. The copies enter as new characters, with no preexisting conditions or effects. Their HP maximum is equal to their BLOODIED value minus any carryover damage from the WOUND, and their size is 1 smaller than their original size (to a minimum of ½). The copies lose all Mini Boss base features except for Enhanced, Incompatible, and Reflexes.
When these copies would be defeated, they split again into 4 new copies with the Minion template, losing the Mini Boss template, with their size being reduced again. Defeated minion Oozes do not split.

name: Undead Construction

The Undead gains one of the following effects:
Cadaverous. The Undead doesn’t make WOUND or OVERSTRESS rolls. When the Undead would take their last WOUND, roll 1d6. On a 5-6, they don’t take the WOUND and go to 1 HP instead. Astral damage and damage from critical hits ignore this effect. 
Ghostly. The Undead is Immune to Physical, but VULNERABLE to Force. They ignore ENGAGEMENT, and can move through the spaces of other characters and objects, but can’t end their turn sharing spaces. They ignore Dangerous Terrain and Difficult Terrain.
Skeletal. The Undead is Resistant to Physical from non-club weapons, but is VULNERABLE to damage from club weapons.

name: Confusion
effect: On Hit: Target treats all enemies as having soft cover until the end of their next turn.\nOn Crit: Target treats all enemies as having hard cover until the end of their next turn.\n

name: Concealing Cloak
effect: The Rogue has soft cover against all enemies beyond [Range 3].

name: Quiver
effect: The Sniper changes the damage of their Compound Bow to either Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force. This change lasts until the Sniper uses this ability again.

name: Sky Shot
effect: The Sniper gains +1 Accuracy against FLYING targets. FLYING targets hit by a ranged attack from the Sniper lose FLYING.

name: Soulless Investiture
effect: The Summoner can attack with this weapon from one of its summons within Scope, drawing line of sight and cover from one of the summon’s spaces.

name: Legendary Resistance
effect: The Mini Boss rolls all Wound and Overstress rolls twice and takes either result.

name: Stealth
effect: The Rogue can (4) HIDE as a Minor Action.

name: Earthcracker Enchant
effect: The Titan’s Giga Hammer creates a [Burst 1] area around the target. Enemies in the area must pass an AGILITY save or take [5/7/8 Physical].

name: Legendary Resistance
effect: The Veteran rolls all Wound and Overstress rolls twice and takes either result.
